title: Náaḵw / Devilfish
author: Yeex̱aas / Lester Roberts
clan: Naasteidí, Deikee Noow Hít; Teeyneidí yádi

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Taakw eetí g̱aat yan yawu.aayí ayú gáan g̱agaanxʼ eina kaanáx̱ ldakát yóo aan ḵoowútch aa saxook. Yóo xʼaan yáx̱ teeyi káx̱ kwsheiyu yóo sh wudzwadí náaḵwch yóo aan een daak tlʼeḵ wulshát tle tlél tleixʼ daa sá wuneix̱. We tsʼootáat tleináx̱ ḵáa du yéetkʼ ḵa du káani een alʼóòn has wuyex̱. Ḵúx̱ has daḵoox̱. Hasdu aan eetí tléil at át ushat. Hasdu hítxʼi ḵa hasdu aankaḵu.oowú tléil tleixʼ áa aa wuneix̱. Tle tsʼayóokʼ has du shaantóot (u)waxíx yóo sh wudzwadí náaḵw.
sentences.sentence_english: Winter-after salmon shore near were when outside sun-in frames surface-on all that town people-of cured some. That red like was because probably that overgrown devilfish-by the town-with to sea tentacle carried and not one thing was saved. That morning one man his small son and brother-in-law with hunting they were out. Back they paddled. Their town site of not there thing remained. Their houses and their town-surface people-of not one there thing was saved. And at once their minds-into came that giant devilfish.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Tle a yís xʼáan sh toox̱ has awdl.aat.
sentences.sentence_english: And toward it anger their minds-in they it brought.

lines.line_english: And toward it anger their minds-in they it brought.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Toow(u)néekw sh x̱ʼeidáx̱ has aawdtee tle a yís yan has (u)wane. Tág̱anís has akaawax̱út y(é) kulyáatʼ, chʼa ḵín kulyáatʼ ḵa yei gulyáatlʼ. Shuxʼwaanax̱ sʼé té tlenxʼ yóo náaḵw ḵoow(ú) káx̱ héende has akaawagooḵ. Tlax̱ xʼoon té héent has akajéil sawé tsaa kínde g̱unéi wuchḵáḵ. G̱aa a ká ḵuḵwadláan awé kaa yaanáx̱ kudlyátʼi aa hasdu tág̱anisí een has aawatáḵt.
sentences.sentence_english: Sorrow their mouths-from they took and for it fully they prepared. Things for stabbing with they chopped, long ones still less long ones and short ones. Beginning-in first big rocks that devilfish cave upon water-in they them threw. Very many rocks water-in they them threw when at once upward starting it moved. Properly on it was deep when, comparatively longest things their poles-of with they kept poking it.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: tlax̱ wáa yóo has akaawusḵʼékw tle a yíkde has kaawasóos. Chʼas has du xʼoos a yíknáx̱ kawutsáa. Has du yéetkʼ yan yóo has ashukaawajáa has du tʼáaḵdáx̱ awé aadé (u)wagút yóo a x̱áng̱aa aan niyaadé. Ḵoon yan shkalnéekdax̱ awé yan kax̱dzneegít yan kax̱dzneegít aa niyaadé yakw woohaa. Chʼu naléiyidáx̱ awé wududzteen yakna- wéini tle chʼa aadé ḵoon akawulneegí yé yáx̱. Yóo náaḵw ḵwa.a has aawajáḵ.
sentences.sentence_english: its stomach they happened to pierce and into it they fell. Only their feet its inside from stuck out. Their little son fully that they one had instructed thus that narrow point over he went that its vicinity-to town side-to. To some fully his tale he told when, completely in order to prove that side-to canoe went. Even when being far that one saw drifting along and just so to them as it he had told. That devilfish however, they it had killed.
